function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of face-to-face communication and team working atmosphere","Impact":"Decreased employee collaboration and morale","Mitigation":"Implement virtual team-building activities and regular video conferencing","Technologies":"Video conferencing and collaboration tools","People":"Individual employees, team members","Owner":"Management, HR department"},{"Description":"Working from home affecting employee working quality and output","Impact":"Reduced productivity and work quality","Mitigation":"Provide training and support for remote work, monitor work performance regularly","Technologies":"Remote work tools, performance management software","People":"Individual employees, managers","Owner":"Management, HR department"},{"Description":"Health and safety concerns related to the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and employee well-being","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, provide protective equipment","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps","People":"All employees, top management","Owner":"Health and safety team, top management"}]}
